body:
k so i made a minecraft server, skype me or ask me for the ip ok. Its a CraftBukkit server with plugins such as worldedit, anticheat and others.
hope to see you there.
Also, tell mehere if you told me on skype, i might not have it open.
Trustworthy players get ranks oke.
Max 24 players.
Skype for ip.
Sounds good.
